name: MOHAMAD SYALVA SYALABI ROSYIDY
aboutMe: I am an experienced backend developer with a proven track record in designing and implementing sophisticated solutions across diverse industries. I have led projects that significantly improved operational efficiency and productivity for renowned clients such as Pertamina Gas Negara, Perusahaan Listrik Negara and Golden Rama

My expertise lies in harnessing cutting-edge technologies like Laravel, Go-Gin, and Lumen 10 to develop high-performance backend systems tailored to specific business needs. I excel in analyzing complex business processes, identifying key pain points, and delivering innovative solutions.

In addition to my technical skills, I hold certifications in various domains, including networking, remote work, and digital marketing. Furthermore, my certifications in cloud computing, cybersecurity, and DevOps reflect my commitment to continuous learning and staying abreast of industry trends.

With a strong focus on collaboration, problem-solving, and delivering tangible results, I am well-equipped to contribute effectively to any backend development team. My portfolio showcases a diverse range of projects, each demonstrating my dedication to innovation and delivering value-driven solutions to clients.
